    • getList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<classProject.routeSearchModel> getList()
      Returns:
      ObservableList - This list contains all the activities returned from the search query.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - This exception handles problems with the search query.
      Exception - - This handles any connection error with the database.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      An ObservableList should have been returned containing any number activities from the database.
      Note:
      This method is used to search for specified activities and their corresponding location information.

    • getListAdvanced

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<classProject.routeSearchModel> getListAdvanced()
      Returns:
      ObservableList - This list contains all the activities returned from the search query.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - This exception handles problems with the search query.
      Exception - - This handles any connection error with the database.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      An ObservableList should have been returned containing any number activities from the database.
      Note:
      This method is used to search for specified activities and their corresponding location information using a search string generated from the advanced search..

    • createProfile

      public static void createProfile​(classProject.Profile p)
      Parameters:
      p - - A Profile object that contains information used to create a new profile entity in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - This handles any problems with the query sent to the database.
      Exception - - This handles any connection errors.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      A new profile should have been inserted into the database table.
      Note:
      This method creates a new profile in the database using the Profile object parameter.

    • mutateProfile

      public static void mutateProfile​(classProject.Profile p)
      Parameters:
      p - - A Profile object that is used to edit an existing profile.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - This handles any problems with the update query.
      Exception - - This handles any problems with the database connection.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      The user's profile should have been edited as desired.
      Note:
      This method is used to edit a user's profile using the Profile parameter as the new set of attributes.

    • exists

      public static boolean exists()
      Returns:
      A boolean that indicates the existence of a profile.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - Handles any problem with the select query.
      Exception - - Handles any database connection problems.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      A boolean should have been returned and the LoggedIn variable should have been changed.
      Note:
      This method is used to check for the existence of the user's profile when they attempt to log in. The loggedIn boolean is set based on if they were able to log in.

    • createLocation

      public static void createLocation​(classProject.Location l)
      Parameters:
      l - - A Location object that is used to create a new location if necessary.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - Handles any problems with the select and insert queries.
      Exception - - Handles any database connection problems.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      The given Location should have been checked for existence in the database and created accordingly.
      Note:
      This method checks if a given Location exists, and creates one if it doesn't.

    • createActivity

      public static void createActivity​(classProject.Activity a)
      Parameters:
      a - - An Activity object that is used to create a new activity in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - Handles any problems with the select and insert queries.
      Exception - - Handles any database connection issues.
      Precondition:
      The database must be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      A new activity should have been created in the database based on the Activity object.
      Note:
      This method creates a new activity in the database table with a unique ID.

    • getActivity

      public static ResultSet getActivity​(classProject.routeSearchModel item)
      Parameters:
      item - - A routeSearchModel object that is used to get more detailed info on the item.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet that contains all the detailed info on the given item.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - Handles and problems with the select query.
      Exception - - Handles any database connection problems.
      Precondition:
      The database should be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      A ResultSet should have been generated and returned to the calling function.
      Note:
      This method uses the given item to get all of it's detailed info from the database. The ResultSet is then returned.

    • getProfile

      public static ResultSet getProfile​(String userNameSearch)
      Parameters:
      userNameSearch - - A String that represents the username of a user that created one of the activities in the result scene.
      Returns:
      A ResultSet containing all of the detailed user info of the given username.
      Throws:
      SQLException - - Handles any problems with the select query.
      Exception - - Handles any database connection problems.
      Precondition:
      The database must be available for connection.
      Postcondition:
      A ResultSet should have been generated and returned containing all of the user's info.
      Note:
      This method gets all info about the specified username and returns it.
